ActJUDGES ACT (ANNUITIES TO SURVIVORS)
PrecisGranting of a lifelong annuity to PAMELA OWEN-FLOOD, widow of the Honourable Dermod D. Owen-Flood, a retired Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, commencing on September 21, 2007.
